meanings.definition: A person or thing that shifts scenes.
meanings.sent1: The sceneshifters swiftly moved the props to change the stage setting.
meanings.sent2: The theater crew consists of talented sceneshifters who transform the scenes seamlessly.
meanings.sent3: The sceneshifters decided to play a prank by rearranging the set during the performance.
meanings.sent4: In the world of theater, sceneshifters are like magical beings who can transport you to different worlds.
meanings.sent5: The sceneshifters' job is to make the transitions between scenes smooth and captivating.

meanings.sent1: During the play, the sceneshifters worked together to create a seamless transition between scenes.
meanings.sent2: The sceneshifters' teamwork was essential in ensuring the smooth flow of the production.
meanings.sent3: The sceneshifters gathered backstage, ready to tackle the challenge of moving the heavy props.
meanings.sent4: As the sceneshifters moved the scenery, it felt like the stage was undergoing a magical transformation.
meanings.sent5: The audience marveled at the skill of the sceneshifters as they effortlessly changed the scenes.
